original_text: For I was indeed stolen out of the land of the Hebrews, and here also I have done nothing that they should put me into the pit.”
korean_text: 나는 히브리 땅에서 끌려온 자요 여기서도 옥에 갇힐 일은 행하지 아니하였나이다

sentences.original_text: For I was indeed stolen out of the land of the Hebrews
and here also I have done nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 여기서 내가 아무것도 하지 않았거늘

sentences.original_text: that they should put me into the pit.
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌 그들이 나를 이 구덩이에 넣으리요
